name: progminer/php-datagen
description: Code generator for making data classes on PHP

install-deps: if [ ! -d jlex-php ] ; then git clone https://github.com/ProgMiner/jlex-php ; fi
generate-lexer: for file in `find app -type f | grep -ox '.*\.lex'` ; do dest=`echo $file | grep -o '\(.*\.\)*'`php ; java -jar jlex-php/JLexPHP.jar -v $file $dest ; ./vendor/bin/php-parse -p $dest | grep -xv "\(====>.*$dest:\|==> Pretty print:\)" > .generate-lexer.tmp ; cp .generate-lexer.tmp $dest ; done
